metadata.description: 'Deep into that darkness peering, long I stood there, wondering, fearing, doubting, dreaming dreams no mortal ever dared to dream before.' - Edgar Allan Poe. Everyone knows that Poe created the detective genre, but did you know he was a detective himself? Finally the secret can be revealed for the first time! Enter the world of Poe and follow the famous author of darkness as he tracks the killer of his brother's friend. Supernatural adventure for fans of books like Hellboy!
metadata.name: Poe
